price: 24. Dheh: Yaa idinka irsaaqa samooyinka iyo arlada? Dheh: Allaah. Innaga ama idinkana mid uun baa hanuunsan ama ku sugan habow cad.
arabic: ۞ قُلۡ مَن يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوۡ إِيَّاكُمۡ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul man yarzuqukum mina al-samāwāti wal-arḍi quli al-lahu wa-innā aw iyyākum laʿalā hudan aw fī ḍalālin mubīnin
